page.title: 07CLUBS AND COMMITTEES l
page.content: GALA COMMITTEE-Run a 'Tote', prize bingo,etc. to raise the Â£lOOO needed to finance Gala Week, the most important week in the year for Culross families with youngsters.MONDAY-Five- a-side football/Quizshow.TUESDAY-Disco Film show.WED.Causeway Race/Crazy Rounders.THURS.Pool Comp./Bingo. FRID.Fancy Dress Comp./Darts Match SAT.Gala Day/Dance. On Gala Day there are races, high jump,tug-o-war,bags of buns and drinks.BROWNIES-Pack formed l92l,today ll girls of 7-lO yrs. Preparing to celebrate 75th Anniver- sary of movement.AGE CONCERN-unpaid organisation to help elderly. Raise funds to organise for the elderly: an evening bus drive in May;a day's outing in Summer, a September concert; a Christmas party with presents and gift vouchers.
